source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is an aerial scenery shot of a lush, green mountain peak surrounded by a sea of thick, white clouds. The camera slowly moves forward, flying along the misty ridgeline. In the distance, other mountain peaks are visible poking through the cloud layer under an overcast sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is an aerial scenery shot of a lush, green mountain peak surrounded by a sea of thick, white clouds. The camera slowly moves forward, flying along the misty ridgeline. In the distance, other mountain peaks are visible poking through the cloud layer under an overcast sky.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists rides along a winding coastal road, weaving between palm trees as the camera follows them from behind. As they approach a sandy beach, several dolphins leap out of the water nearby. The cyclists then stop to watch a sailboat pass close to the shore before continuing their ride along the waterfront.
